Control Name: 5.3.3 Technologies and frameworks used in this workload are fully understood, including their vulnerabilities.
Control Statement: It is important to understand what technologies are used by the application and must be managed, such as .NET Core , Spring, or Node.js. Each choice of technology also has consequences for security.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.3 What practices and tools have you implemented as part of the development cycle?
